title: Descartes' Meaning Crisis
description:
Clip Collages - where taking things out of context is an art form!
Featuring:
/watch?v=mV-syGOfmqI - SnippetofWisdom - Terence McKenna - About Rene Descartes

/watch?v=gIe4tU7ZWIg - guy sengstock - Inner & Outer Dia-logos
